section.title: File Type - Polar
section.p: Glide polar. The WinPilot format is used for glide polar files.
The WinPilot and XCSoar websites provide several glide polar files. Files for other gliders may be created upon request to the XCSoar team.

section.title: Advanced - Programming
section.p: Simple text file that was created by the creators of WinPilot. It is unlikely to change as it is already very simple to use/read.
